languages.text: {n}Неслышимыми тенями дикари-акобы, неграмотные приемыши Омниссии, входят в зал обсерваториума. Без команд, ведомые интуитивным пониманием момента, они занимают места в кругу, привлеченные зовом Паскаля... или уже кого-то иного.{/n}

{n}The Acgen tribesfolk, the ignorant fosterlings of the Omnissiah, slip into the observatorium hall like silent shadows. Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they automatically gather in a circle, heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Неслышимыми тенями дикари-акобы, неграмотные приемыши Омниссии, входят в зал обсерваториума. Без команд, ведомые интуитивным пониманием момента, они занимают места в кругу, привлеченные зовом Паскаля... или уже кого-то иного.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Acgen tribesfolk, the Omnissiah's illiterate stepchildren, slip into the observatorium hall like silent shadows. Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they gather in a circle without being told to do so, merely heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Acgen tribesfolk, the Omnissiah's illiterate stepchildren, slip into the observatorium hall like silent shadows. Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they gather in a circle without being told to do so, merely heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Acgen tribesfolk, the Omnissiah's illiterate wards, slip into the observatorium hall like silent shadows. Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they automatically gather in a circle, merely heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they automatically gather in a circle, merely heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}

Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they automatically gather in a circle, heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Acgen tribesfolk, the ignorant fosterlings of the Omnissiah, slip into the observatorium hall like silent shadows. Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they automatically gather in a circle, heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}無知ながら万機神の後見役となるアクジェン族の人々は、静かな影のごとく観察室の広間に忍び込む。事の重大さを察知して自然に輪になるように集まり、パスカルの呼びかけに注意を向ける…あるいは、この時点では他の者の呼びかけにも気を払っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Acgen tribesfolk, the ignorant fosterlings of the Omnissiah, slip into the observatorium hall like silent shadows. Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they automatically gather in a circle, heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}無知ながら万機神の後見役となるアクジェン族の人々は、静かな影のごとく観察室の広間に忍び込む。事の重大さを察知して自然に輪になるように集まり、パスカルの呼びかけに注意を向ける…あるいは、この時点では他の者の呼びかけにも気を払っていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}通侍部落的成员，欧姆尼塞亚的那些无知的子女，此刻如同无声的影子一般，溜进了瞭望台的大厅。他们通过直觉，意识到重要的时刻即将到来。他们自发地围成一个圈，静静聆听着帕斯卡的召唤……或者，此时此刻而言，是来自另一个存在的召唤。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Acgen tribesfolk, the ignorant fosterlings of the Omnissiah, slip into the observatorium hall like silent shadows. Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they automatically gather in a circle, heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}通侍部落的人，欧姆尼塞亚的那些文盲守卫，此刻如同无声的影子一般，溜进了瞭望台的大厅。他们通过直觉，意识到重要的时刻即将到来。他们自发地围成一个圈，静静聆听着帕斯卡的召唤……或者，就此时此刻而言，是来自另一个存在的召唤。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les Acgen, enfants ignorants de l'Omnimessie, se glissent telles des ombres silencieuses dans l'observatorium. Mus par l'instinct face à cet événement crucial, ils forment automatiquement un cercle en réponse à l'invocation de Pasqal... ou, peut-être, de quelqu'un d'autre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Acgen tribesfolk, the ignorant fosterlings of the Omnissiah, slip into the observatorium hall like silent shadows. Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they automatically gather in a circle, heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les Acgen, enfants ignorants de l'Omnimessie, se glissent telles des ombres silencieuses dans l'observatorium. Mus par l'instinct face à cet événement crucial, ils forment automatiquement un cercle en réponse à l'invocation de Pasqal... ou, peut-être, de quelqu'un d'autre.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los miembros de la tribu Acgen, los pupilos ignorantes del Omnissiah, se adentran en la sala del observatorium como sombras silenciosas y, automáticamente, forman un círculo siguiendo la invocación de Pasqal... o quizás, llegados a este punto, la de otro ser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Acgen tribesfolk, the ignorant fosterlings of the Omnissiah, slip into the observatorium hall like silent shadows. Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they automatically gather in a circle, heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los miembros de la tribu Acgen, los pupilos analfabetos del Omnissiah, se adentran en la sala del observatorium como sombras silenciosas y, automáticamente, forman un círculo siguiendo únicamente la invocación de Pasqal... o quizás, llegados a este punto, la de otro ser.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Akgen-Stammesmitglieder, die ignoranten Zöglinge des Omnissiah, gleiten in die Halle des Observatoriums wie leise Schatten. Getrieben von einem intuitiven Verständnis der Bedeutsamkeit des Augenblicks versammeln sie sich automatisch in einem Kreis, folgen Pasqals Ruf ... oder inzwischen vielleicht dem Ruf eines anderen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Acgen tribesfolk, the ignorant fosterlings of the Omnissiah, slip into the observatorium hall like silent shadows. Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they automatically gather in a circle, heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Akgen-Stammesmitglieder, die analphabetischen Hüter des Omnissiah, gleiten in die Halle des Observatoriums wie leise Schatten. Getrieben von einem intuitiven Verständnis der Bedeutsamkeit des Augenblicks versammeln sie sich automatisch in einem Kreis, folgen lediglich Pasqals Ruf ... oder inzwischen vielleicht dem Ruf eines anderen.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Hagen kabilesi üyeleri, Hermesih'in cahil evlatları, sessiz gölgeler gibi gözlemhane salonuna akıyorlar. Yaşanan anın önemini içgüdüsel olarak fark etmiş durumdalar. Otomatik olarak bir çember oluşturuyor, Pasqal'ın veya bu noktada başka birinin çağrısına kulak veriyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Acgen tribesfolk, the ignorant fosterlings of the Omnissiah, slip into the observatorium hall like silent shadows. Led by an intuitive grasp of the significance of the moment, they automatically gather in a circle, heeding Pasqal's summons... or perhaps, at this point, someone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hagen kabilesi üyeleri, Hermesih'in cahil evlatları, sessiz gölgeler gibi gözlemhane salonuna akıyorlar. Yaşanan anın önemini içgüdüsel olarak fark etmiş durumdalar. Otomatik olarak bir çember oluşturuyor, Pasqal'ın, veya bu noktada başka birinin, çağrısına kulak veriyorlar.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
